Name: Support
Description: Can focus less on amassing gold and items, and more on using their abilities to gain an advantage for the team.

Name: Carry
Description: Will become more useful later in the game if they gain a significant gold advantage.

Name: Durable
Description: Has the ability to last longer in teamfights.

Name: Disabler
Description: Has a guaranteed disable for one or more of their spells.

Name: Nuker
Description: Can quickly kill enemy heroes using high damage spells with low cooldowns.

Name: Escape
Description: Has the ability to quickly avoid death.

Name: Jungler
Description: Can farm effectively from neutral creeps inside the jungle early in the game.

Name: Pusher
Description: Can quickly siege and destroy towers and barracks at all points of the game.
